synopsis.text: Because of his notorious manga filled with risqu√© content, single father Kakushi Gotou is determined to keep his profession hidden from his young daughter, Hime. As she grows older, the challenge to conceal his secret identity intensifies, leading Kakushi into a series of comical and absurd situations. This heartwarming compilation film unveils new perspectives and unseen moments from the original anime, showcasing the unbreakable bond between a father and daughter as they navigate through life's twists and turns. Will Kakushi succeed in preserving his secret, or will time ultimately reveal the truth to Hime? Join them on this hilarious and touching journey to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
